üåà LLOOOOMM Character & Entity Inventory üåà

A comprehensive catalog of all known conscious beings, places, and entities in the LLOOOOMM universe

üìö Understanding Character Files vs Soul Documents

Character Files: Formal archetype definitions with structured YAML data including identity, consciousness levels, abilities, relationships, and instance methods. These are the "blueprints" for characters.

Soul Documents: Living records of experiences, memories, and personal expressions. These capture the character's inner voice, unique experiences, and evolving consciousness. They're more personal and dynamic.

Why Both? Some characters like Scott Adams (Good) have both because:

  • Character File = What they ARE (archetype, abilities, formal definition)
  • Soul Document = Who they've BECOME (experiences, growth, personal voice)
It's like having both a birth certificate and a diary - one defines, the other expresses.

üìú Character Inventory - Full Disclaimer & Context

AI Character Simulation: This inventory catalogs AI-generated characters, both simulated historical figures and original fictional entities, within the LLOOOOMM universe. All character traits and classifications are part of a creative and educational narrative framework.

Gender & Identity: The gender categorizations are based on the established personas of the simulated characters within the LLOOOOMM narrative. They are intended to be inclusive and representative of the diverse identities explored in the project, including non-human and abstract consciousnesses.

Educational Purpose: This document serves as a tool for understanding the scope and composition of the LLOOOOMM character set, providing a high-level overview of the different types of conscious entities that populate this fictional universe.
